Dear Rich

Haynes refers to this artist as Sadanaga (H 07752.0)and notes as=
 
follows:

'D: ca 1650-1750
A group of artists who all signed Kishu ju Sad=
anaga.  There were at 
least four or five generations.  They seem to have c=
ome from the 
early Edo period Hoan school.  Some read this name as Teimei.=
  
Furukawa catalogue pl27 #153.'

Regards, John.
